name: Intergalactic National Championship (JPLikesGames)
description:
This was a submission for the game jam event UCF vs USF. This was made within a total amount of 24 hours.

Story:

In the distant future... Universities have expanded to such degree that territory has become scarce. A battle for ownership of land soon followed...

After many hard battles were fought and lives were lost, two universities remained. Now its up to you and your greatest rival to decide the fate of the world...

Controls:

 2 Xbox Controllers are REQUIRED for the intended purpose.

Use the Left analog stick to move. 

Use the Right analog stick for rotating/aiming.

Use the Right bumper to fire.

Use the mouse to navigate the menu.

Credits:

Game Design:  Jean Paul Salman & Manuel Govea

Code:  Dalton Hyde, Jesse McNamee,  Manuel Govea

Music: Manuel Govea

Story: Jean Paul Salman, Dalton Hyde

Art: Jean P. Salman, Wesley Gordon 

UI Design: Edwin Sanchez, Jean P. Salman, Wesley Gordon.
